title: Rare wooden-cased Apple-1 computer blasts past auctioneer estimate — sells for almost half a million dollars

title: The future of DRAM: From DDR5 advancements to future ICs

title: SoftBank beams 5G to phones from the sky in successful stratospheric test flight
summary: SoftBank successfully delivered end-to-end 5G connectivity to standard smartphones using an airborne base station, in a live field trial conducted in June, above Hachijō Island, Japan.
